Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Moses:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te peniot e~youab n~dikeoc: pijwri abba Mwc/ piacket/c: P~[oic arih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers: of our holy father the righteous: the strong Abba Moses the ascetic: O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
